name: Beelzemon Blast Mode
effect: When this card is trashed from your deck, delete 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon.[When Digivolving] Delete all of your opponent's Digimon with the highest level.[Your Turn] For every 10 cards in your trash, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
